metaTags.metaDescription: Accelerate your application modernization with Cloudflare. Streamline app delivery, security, and observability while reducing costs—whether you're rehosting, refactoring, or building new AI-powered apps.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Webinar: 3 strategies to modernize applications and build for what's next. Sign up now >

relatedBlades.title: Modernize applications
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare accelerates the time-to-value for your application modernization strategy — whether you are rehosting, replatforming, refactoring, or building new apps.

Launch innovative apps and AI primitives, and regain control of complex app architectures with app delivery, security, observability, and development capabilities — all while lowering costs.

relatedBlades.title: Ditch legacy, embrace agility
relatedBlades.copy:
Pressures to integrate AI, meet rising user expectations, and deliver personalized experiences have exposed the fragility of legacy application architectures. 

But app modernization efforts often stall due to technology complexity, security concerns, and challenges aligning on strategy.

button.elementName: Modernize applications -  Read Forrester study - button

columnContent.title: Inflexible infrastructure
columnContent.description: Modernizing apps with legacy edge delivery services moves app services to the cloud — but creates fragmented networks that hamper business and developer agility.

columnContent.title: AI management overhead
columnContent.description: Modernizing apps with hyperscalers means gaining AI's business value — but also having to manage its infrastructure headaches.

columnContent.title: Cloud lock-in
columnContent.description: Modernizing apps with hyperscalers can accelerate cloud migration—while locking you into one cloud, increasing risks and costs, and reducing flexibility.

relatedBlades.title: Modernize your apps, elevate your business
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's connectivity cloud enables the shortest time to value across three common application modernization strategies: rehosting, replatforming, and refactoring / building new applications.

Cloudflare app delivery, security, observability, and development capabilities are built on one programmable and composable platform — so your teams can build faster, operate smarter, and scale without compromise.

features.title: Rehost apps
features.description: Rehost app infrastructure with Cloudflare to extend the lifetime of your applications and deliver delightful, consistent customer experiences globally.

features.title: Replatform apps
features.description: Replatform apps with Cloudflare to seamlessly connect services, centralize security, and simplify your IT setup — without needing to change existing code.

features.title: Refactor and build new apps
features.description: Refactor and build new apps with Cloudflare to accelerate AI adoption and deploy full stack apps with serverless development and inference at the edge.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare customers eliminated $1.1M in legacy technology spend over three years
relatedBlades.copy: New Forrester research found that Cloudflare's connectivity cloud helped consolidate point solutions and eliminate spend on hardware, maintenance, and licensing fees.

button.elementName: New Forrester study - Cloudflare customers boosted security team efficiency by 29% - CTA

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare helps Shopify personalize online shopping experiences

content.value: Shopify powers ecommerce transactions for millions of businesses, providing their customers with the tools essential to managing a successful retail business without complex, costly independent technical overheads.

A complete business management ecosystem, the Shopify platform supports everything from product sourcing, sales and inventory tracking, payment processing, and shipping to customer accounts management, marketing, and reporting.
"Cloudflare puts our services within 50 milliseconds of anybody on the planet. That allows us to build experiences that feel local to everyone, everywhere, at any time."
